ComicInfo.Title: Dwyer Creek
ComicInfo.Summary: The raging pathogen continues its vicious course of destruction as its origin is slowly unveiled. Bill Farnum, a mild mannered husband and father battles a slow descent into rabid craziness. What chance does an average family man stand when the monster inside is unleashed? It's domestic horror at its finest as the exclusive prequel to the hit Overture Films release THE CRAZIES continues its deadly path of small town destruction.
